txt.en: Not every Deep-lizard in the Water-wheels is easy prey to the wandering adventurer. Spit-tail is a beast to be reckoned with.
Vile foes, both beast and spirit, haunt the flooded depths of the Water-wheels.
A Caerog, an earth-demon, was awakened within Moria when the Balrog fled into hiding there. With the Balrog slain, Caerl청g now stalks the flooded Water-wheels, spreading his terror.
